document.full_text: british electro-pop duo the pet shop boys have turned their talents to ballet for the first time, setting danish author hans christian andersen's fairytale "the most incredible thing" to music.
document.title: pet shop boys write first ballet
lines_and_colors: british electro-pop duo the pet shop boys have turned their talents to ballet for the first time, setting danish author hans christian andersen's fairytale "the most incredible thing" to music.
